#summary R_top_quantifier_elimination(Qx F)
R_top_quantifier_elimination(Qx F)
<pre>
inputs: Q is a quantifier ("there exists", or "for all") over x, F is a boolean formula on equalities.
return: an equivalent formula to Qx F by eliminating the quantification Qx.
</pre>
| `F <- `[RewriterTopSimplify R_top_simplify]`(F)`<br>
| `if Q is "for all"`<br>
|.... `return `[RewriterSimplify R_simplify]`(`[RewriterCard R_card]`(|F|`,,x,,`, Q) = |type(x)| )`<br>
| `if Q is "there exists"`<br>
|.... `return `[RewriterSimplify R_simplify]`(`[RewriterCard R_card]`(|F|`,,x,,`, Q) > 0)`<br>
